en.title: FusionExcel Making Waves at 3rd Boracay International Dragon Boat Festival!
en.content:
REPORT BY THE PHILIPPINES COUNTRY LICENSEE & PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR JEREMY LOOI.

Early this May, for 3 straight days the crystal clear waters of Boracay burst into color as it hosted the Philippines' Department of Tourism backed Dragon Boat Festival, the biggest sporting event on the island. 

This 3rd Boracay International Dragon Boat Festival was bigger and even better than the previous 2 years - a fun filled event incorporating the dragon boat spirit of sportsmanship and great international camaraderie.

More than 1,000 participants making up 50 teams from Australia, Canada, Macau, Germany, Singapore, Hong Kong, the United States and etc. What a wonderful opportunity to expose our amazing range of products to all these foreign and local visitors! 
 
Jan Georg Hansen, FE's International Leader from Norway, stands with Professional Models 
Maria (left) and Kariza (right) as they prepare to represent FusionExcel during the Dragonboat 
Festivities. Jan not only prepared all visual banners, beach wear and graphics (body paint on the 
models), but also scalarized large quantities of iced bottled water for each day's long events of 
fun in the sun, and made sure there were FusionExcel banners everywhere on the beach, 
Jan also trained Maria and Kariza how to demonstrate the products to curious onlookers.
Jan's Team of FusionExcel personnel geared up for the event and were ready to show off FE's 
exciting and amazing range of Quantum Science products!
This was the first time the Boracay All-Star team had heard about FusionExcel's Scalar 
Energy Products. Jan was able to sponsor the entire team.

 
They were all amazed by the demonstrations and were able to report back to Jan that they felt stronger and more energized during the races. Boracay's All-Star team finished 2nd place out of the 50 participating teams! They had brought great honors to the country through sheer determination, teamwork, diligent preparation and sacrifices.

To Jan Georg Hansen, FE's Norwegian leader, and the Boracay All-Star Team, we salute you for a great job done!!! 

Ahoo! Ahoo! Ahoo!!
